types:type.name: carRentals_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type carRentals_json = Array<{| origin: String, destination: String, rentDate: String, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, carTotalSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, carBrand: String, company: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"origin\\\":\\\"OHare\\\",\\\"destination\\\":\\\"Midway\\\",\\\"rentDate\\\":\\\"2021-03-24\\\",\\\"price\\\":50,\\\"carTotalSeats\\\":5,\\\"carBrand\\\":\\\"Nissan Sentra\\\",\\\"company\\\":\\\"National\\\"},{\\\"origin\\\":\\\"OHare\\\",\\\"destination\\\":\\\"Midway\\\",\\\"rentDate\\\":\\\"2021-03-24\\\",\\\"price\\\":70,\\\"carTotalSeats\\\":7,\\\"carBrand\\\":\\\"Honda Odyssey\\\",\\\"company\\\":\\\"National\\\"}]"}

types:type.name: carRental_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type carRental_json = {| origin: String, destination: String, rentDate: String, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, carTotalSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, carBrand: String, company: String |} {"example": "{\\\"origin\\\":\\\"OHare\\\",\\\"destination\\\":\\\"Midway\\\",\\\"rentDate\\\":\\\"2021-03-24\\\",\\\"price\\\":50,\\\"carTotalSeats\\\":5,\\\"carBrand\\\":\\\"Nissan Sentra\\\",\\\"company\\\":\\\"National\\\"}"}

types:type.name: national_carRentals_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type national_carRentals_json = {| Rentals: Array<{| origin: String, destination: String, rentDate: String, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, totalSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, brand: String, company: String |}> |} {"example": "{\\\"Rentals\\\":[{\\\"origin\\\":\\\"OHare\\\",\\\"destination\\\":\\\"Midway\\\",\\\"rentDate\\\":\\\"Mar 24, 2021\\\",\\\"price\\\":50,\\\"totalSeats\\\":5,\\\"brand\\\":\\\"Nissan Sentra\\\",\\\"company\\\":\\\"National\\\"},{\\\"origin\\\":\\\"OHare\\\",\\\"destination\\\":\\\"Midway\\\",\\\"rentDate\\\":\\\"Mar 24, 2021\\\",\\\"price\\\":70,\\\"totalSeats\\\":7,\\\"brand\\\":\\\"Honda Odyssey\\\",\\\"company\\\":\\\"National\\\"}]}"}
